message.body: Hey! Hope all is well. One of the girls who will be living there in August hasn't seen the place and wants to stop by this week. Could I give her your cell and
Of course! It'll be a good excuse to clean the house again. Give her my info!
K, thanks! Do you still need a letter of recommendation?
Yes please! That would be great.
how exactly do you want me to write your name? I always ask because some people use full name, etc. also, you said this was for places to live, correct?
Just Haley McFeely is fine Yeah, just a letter of good faith that I can show to potential landlords when I move to San Francisco. Thank you!
Sounds good. I'll take care of that this week.
